item.description:
Normally I don't like to post too many things during the month, but when I was reminded that Restaurant Week is arriving soon, I had to post!!! During Restaurant Week the best of the best, provide a Prix Fixe Menu and make the unaffordable not only affordable, but a must!!!

Barcelona captures the beautiful simplicity of traditional Spanish food while presenting this food in a modern, trendy way means that the Chef and Staff of Barcelona New Haven have created and contained a culinary miracle. If you are a foodie or a gourmet, this is a great opportunity to taste some of the finest ingredients prepared with passion and artful simplicity. Beautifully furnished, beautiful food, and is prix fixe at $29.00 for a three course meal (appetizer, entree and dessert). One of my favorite dining experiences of all time. Who would have thought this little university town could harbor such a culinary gem...

Voted New Haven Advocate’s “Best New Restaurant” and “Best Wine List,” Barcelona is located next to the Omni Hotel in downtown New Haven just steps from Yale University. A street-level lounge overlooks a dining bar area with a stone fireplace. The sophisticated glass-and-steel dining room is framed by a 2000-bottle refrigerated wine cellar. The dramatic 80-seat private room is dominated by a larger than life, wall to wall, 30-foot mural of a Spanish Bullfighter, and a 20-person Chef’s Table, fashioned from a single walnut tree, borders the busy open kitchen.


"This is me, a Spaniard, guaranteeing that this is a truly unique, religiously sensual experience." :Enjoy your life, try this restaurant, and ¡viva España!"-Dan Gamito
[/color
